Plot: Called up for service in Iraq, several members of the National Guard were given digital video cameras. This film, edited from their footage, provides a perspective on a complex and troubled conflict.
Title: The War Tapes
Actors: Zack Bazzi, Duncan Domey, Ben Flanders, Mike Moriarty
tomatoConsensus: Candid, eye-opening footage gives viewers a close-up -- and educational -- look at the experiences of American soldiers in Iraq, a viewpoint not normally seen.
